Initializer# init(source:weights:scaleValue:type:flags:)

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.13+tvOS 11.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    source sourceNode: MPSNNImageNode,
    weights: any MPSCNNConvolutionDataSource,
    scaleValue: Float,
    type: MPSCNNBinaryConvolutionType,
    flags: MPSCNNBinaryConvolutionFlags
)
```
